snippet: A series of bombings in Myanmar was aimed at scaring away foreign investors, the national police chief said Friday.
abstract: Police say series of bombings in Myanmar over weeklong period that left 3 people dead and 10 injured were aimed at scaring away foreign investors.
lead_paragraph: A series of bombings in Myanmar was aimed at scaring away foreign investors, the national police chief said Friday.

headline.main: Myanmar: Police Have Theory for Blasts
headline.print_headline: Myanmar: Police Have Theory for Blasts
